summary: Completed testing of 4 major features: 1) Legacy catalogue service removal, 2) FastTrack queue priority, 3) Printed Copy postal tracking, 4) Enhanced compliance score. All 26 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified with all badge styling present.
critical_code_review_comments: SEED_SERVICES correctly excludes removed services: INVENTORY_PRO, EPC_CONSULT, HMO_LICENCE_SUPPORT, PORTFOLIO_ANALYSIS, LEASE_EXTENSION, AIRBNB_SETUP
WF1 (wf1_payment_to_queue) correctly sets queue_priority (5 for fast_track, 10 for priority) and expedited flag
process_queued_orders sorts by queue_priority DESC, then priority DESC, then fast_track DESC, then created_at ASC
Postal endpoints implemented: GET /postal/pending, POST /{id}/postal/status, POST /{id}/postal/address
Postal status flow: PENDING_PRINT → PRINTED → DISPATCHED → DELIVERED (with FAILED option)
REQUIREMENT_TYPE_WEIGHTS correctly defined: Gas Safety 1.5x, EICR 1.4x, EPC 1.2x, HMO_LICENCE 1.6x
HMO_SCORE_MULTIPLIER set to 0.9 for stricter HMO property scoring
Compliance score breakdown includes: status_score, expiry_score, document_score, overdue_penalty_score, risk_score
Compliance score weights: Status 35%, Expiry 25%, Documents 15%, Overdue Penalty 15%, Risk 10%
OrderList.jsx has FastTrack badge with bg-purple-100 and animate-pulse classes
OrderList.jsx has Print Copy badge with bg-cyan-100 class
OrderDetailsPane.jsx has postal delivery section with status badges and tracking info
seed_data_creation: No test data created - used existing seeded data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 45 tested 4 major features: 1) Verified 6 services removed from SEED_SERVICES (INVENTORY_PRO, EPC_CONSULT, HMO_LICENCE_SUPPORT, PORTFOLIO_ANALYSIS, LEASE_EXTENSION, AIRBNB_SETUP), 2) FastTrack queue priority with queue_priority field (5 for fast_track, 10 for priority) and expedited flag in WF1, 3) Postal tracking endpoints at /api/admin/orders/postal/pending, /{id}/postal/status, /{id}/postal/address with status flow PENDING_PRINT→PRINTED→DISPATCHED→DELIVERED, 4) Enhanced compliance score with REQUIREMENT_TYPE_WEIGHTS (Gas Safety 1.5x, EICR 1.4x, EPC 1.2x) and breakdown fields (status_score, expiry_score, document_score, overdue_penalty_score, risk_score). Frontend badges verified: FastTrack (purple, animate-pulse), Print Copy (cyan), Priority (orange).

postal_tracking.valid_statuses: PASS - PENDING_PRINT, PRINTED, DISPATCHED, DELIVERED, FAILED

enhanced_compliance_score.breakdown_fields: PASS - status_score, expiry_score, document_score, overdue_penalty_score, risk_score
enhanced_compliance_score.weights_documented: PASS - Status 35%, Expiry 25%, Docs 15%, Overdue 15%, Risk 10%

frontend_badges.postal_delivery_section: PASS - status badge, tracking number, address display

mocked_apis.note: Email notifications for postal dispatch use test credentials
